summary: Mayhem is a Norwegian black metal band formed in 1984. They are known for their controversial live shows and influenced the black metal genre. The band faced tragedy with the suicide of their singer, Per Yngve Ohlin, and the murder of guitarist Ã˜ystein Aarseth by a former member. Mayhem released influential demos and an EP, and their debut album, "De Mysteriis Dom Sathanas," is a black metal classic. After reforming in 1995, they continued to experiment with their sound and won a Spellemann Award for their 2007 album "Ordo Ad Chao."
title: Mayhem (band)
